start.text: Hello, {0}! Please select a topic of your interest

menu_first_topic.text: Cats *spend 70% of their lives sleeping*, which is around 13-16 hours a day.

menu_second_topic.text: On October 18th 1963 Felicette, also known as "Astrocat" was the first and only cat to go to space.

menu_more_topics.text: Ok, enough of cats, let's talk about dogs!

markup.text: The Beatles song "A Day in the Life"
The oldest dog breed in the world

menu_first_dog_topic.text: In an interview in 2013, Paul McCartney said that he added a frequency only dogs can hear to the Beatles song "A Day in the Life".

menu_second_dog_topic.text: ​The Guinness World Record for the oldest dog breed is held by the Saluki. The breed dates back to 329BC.
